about_the_game:
A set allowing the player to receive 4 horses free of charge. These horses are superhorses of the Winning Post series, Out of America, Nekoko Nekoro Girl, Cross Ring, and Dark Legend.

●How to Use
① If starting the game from 1991, then the 1st week of January each year, or if starting from 2021, then the 1st week of June 2021, confirm the application of the additional contents.

② When applied, the following 4 superhorses will transferred to the player free of charge.
Out of America (Born 2018)
　Sire: Pyro
　Dam: Global Peace
Nekoko Nekoro Girl (Born 2018)
　Sire: TM Opera O
　Dam: Bella Rheia
Cross Ring (Born 2019)
　Sire: Kurofune
　Dam: Blanc Bonheur
Dark Legend (Born 2019)
　Sire: Kurofune
　Dam: Name Value

●Caution
・When starting the game from 2021, the superhorses cannot be obtained if the additional contents is not validated before the 1st week of June of the same year.
・When starting the game from 1991, the superhorses cannot be obtained if any of the following conditions exist.

　・The DLC is not validated by the time the superhorse turns 2.
　・If the Sire of the superhorse is not registered with the stallions.
　・If the Dam of the superhorse is not registered with the broodmares.
　・If the broodmare that is the superhorse's dam is not owned by the player, or if 1 year before the birth of the superhorse, the sire and the dam are not bred together.
　・The purchase is not made before the superhorse turns 2.

・When starting from 2021, if the DLC is not applied, then the 4 horses available through this DLC will not be obtainable in the game.
・When starting from 1991, even if the DLC is not applied, with a charm and in-game funds, the superhorses will be obtainable.
・The sire and dam of the superhorse are not a part of the free purchase set.
・It is not necessary to obtain the ancestors of the horse in order to freely purchase the superhorse.

　・The purchase is not made before the superhorse turns 2.

・When starting from 2021, if the DLC is not applied, then the 4 horses available through this DLC will not be obtainable in the game.
・When starting from 1991, even if the DLC is not applied, with a charm and in-game funds, the superhorses will be obtainable.

name: WP9 2020 オリジナルスーパーホース 購入権セット 全4頭

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 Japanese version 64 bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1GB or over, 1280 x 720 pixel display or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 Japanese version 64 bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1GB or over, 1280 x 720 pixel display or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
